title: When will Indian judicial system including a agencies like consumer forum learn their scope of work
selftext:
Why can a private business not charge for things on it premise. Actually a business is free to charge even for using their toilets if they decide to do so. Why can a business not charge for the plastic bag it has paid and bought. Why has a business to give it free to anyone something it has paid money for. 

Promise you, people spend huge amount of effort to carry bags from home when they find its chargeable at the store. Most don't care for environment.
